Docs.summary: Provides a factory that creates a Secure Store provider object for the default Secure Store in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.BusinessData.Infrastructure.SecureStore.ISecureStoreProvider Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As ISecureStoreProvider

Docs.summary: Creates a Secure Store provider object for the default Secure Store in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.
Docs.returns: A Secure Store provider object for the default Secure Store in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.

remarks.para: This method creates the default provider for the default Secure Store. Only one provider can be used at a time.

example.para: Code Snippet: Get User Credentials Using the Default Secure Store Provider
